item.title: R to @FinanceYF5:
R to @FinanceYF5: Anime game characters make up 23%, mainly dominated by Genshin Impact, with only 2 not from Genshin Impact: Lucy from 2077, and [Arknights].
item.content:encoded: Anime game characters make up 23%, mainly dominated by Genshin Impact, with only 2 not from Genshin Impact: Lucy from 2077, and [Arknights].

item.title: R to @FinanceYF5: "Top 1-20 character rankings in November. Characters from Genshin Impact accounted for 4 spots. Anime characters took 8 spots, and interactive game characters 2 spots."
item.content:encoded:
"Top 1-20 character rankings in November.
Characters from Genshin Impact accounted for 4 spots. Anime characters took 8 spots, and interactive game characters 2 spots."

item.title: R to @FinanceYF5: Comparison of the total number of interactions in CAI from August 15 to November 15. The growth rate of animated characters is higher than that of real-life characters
item.content:encoded:
Comparison of the total number of interactions in CAI from August 15 to November 15.
The growth rate of animated characters is higher than that of real-life characters

item.title: R to @FinanceYF5: On November 15, the total number of interactions was 5 http://billion.Data for September and October was not collected; the estimate is based on the data from August. with subsequent growth estimated at 1 billion times per month.
item.content:encoded:
On November 15, the total number of interactions was 5 billion.Data for September and October was not collected; the estimate is based on the data from August.
with subsequent growth estimated at 1 billion times per month.

item.title:
CharacterAI November Data Analysisï¼ˆ1/20ï¼‰
Take away 1 Anime characters still account for 77+ 2 the number of interactions has reached 5 billion, with an average monthly growth of 1 billion. 3 Genshin Impact remains strong, followed by anime characters. @character_ai
Thread
item.content:encoded:
CharacterAI November Data Analysisï¼ˆ1/20ï¼‰

Take away
1 Anime characters still account for 77+
2 the number of interactions has reached 5 billion, with an average monthly growth of 1 billion.
3 Genshin Impact remains strong, followed by anime characters.
@character_ai
